member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogImageFileMultipleImagesNotSupportedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the image provider does not support multiple images.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.Exceptions.CogImageFileUnknownImageFileExtensionException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the specified image file's extension does not correspond to any of the registered image file providers.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileProviderStateFlags
member.summary: Class that defines the state flags for the ICogImageFileProvider interface. Each static field in this class defines a single bit flag. These flags may appear in the EventArgs of a Changed event fired by any class implementing ICogImageFileProvider.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileProviderStateFlags.SfCount
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Count may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileProviderStateFlags.SfFileName
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by FileName may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileProviderStateFlags.SfOpenMode
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by OpenMode may have changed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile
member.summary: Object supporting access to image files.

remarks.PARA: The supports generic access to image files using any of the registered image file providers.
If you know the image file format ahead of time or if you need specific image file functionality, you can use the appropriate image file provider interface, rather than .

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.#ctor(Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile)
member.param: The instance to copy from.
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of this class as a deep copy of the given instance.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of this class.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SfCount
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Count may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SfFileName
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by FileName may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SfOpenMode
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by OpenMode may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SfProvider
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Provider may have changed.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SupportedFileTypes

remarks.PARA: Returns an that contains the file extensions of the supported image file types.

member.summary: File extensions of image file types that are supported.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Determine how many image file types are supportedDim FileTypes as CogStringCollection Dim FileTypes As New CogStringCollection FileTypes = imagefile.SupportedFileTypes MessageBox.Show("Number of supported file types: " + FileTypes.Count)

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Provider

remarks.PARA: Returns the image file provider for the currently open file or NULL if no file is open. You can use the to query for a specific interface of an underlying image file provider. For example, a client control may use this property to display TIFF-specific property pages.

member.summary: The image file provider for the current open file or 0 if there is no file open.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Get file provider Dim objImageFileProvider As Object objImageFileProvider = imagefile.Provider

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.FilterText

remarks.PARA: A string that contains the filter text used by the Filter property of a CommonDialog control to select various types of image files.

member.summary: A string suitable for displaying in a CommonDialog Control.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Use the FilterText property objCommonDialog.Filter = ImageFile.FilterText

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.OpenMode
member.summary: Mode in which the file was opened.

remarks.PARA: Mode in which the file was opened, or if no file is open. This is a read only property.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.Visionpro.ImageFile
If imagefile.OpenMode = CogImageFileModeConstants.Write Then MessageBox.Show("File Is Open in Write Mode") End If

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.FileName
member.summary: Name of last opened file.

remarks.PARA: Name of the last opened file. If no file is open, is NULL.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.Visionpro.ImageFile
' Get the name of the last opened file and display it Dim strFileName As String strFileName = imagefile.FileName MessageBox.Show("Last file opened was:" + strFileName)

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Item(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the item to get or set.
member.summary: Gets or sets the item at the specified index. In C#, this property is the indexer for the collection.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Get an image from fileDim ImageFile as New CogImageFile Dim Image As CogImage8Grey imagefile.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Image = imagefile.Item(0) imagefile.Close()

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SyncRoot
member.summary: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to this collection.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.IsSynchronized
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether access to this collection is synchronized (thread-safe).

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of items contained in this collection.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Find the count of images in an image fileDim ImageFile as New CogImageFile imagefile.Open("c:\image.cdb", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Dim ImageCount As Integer ImageCount = ImageFile.Count

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.ChangedEventSuspended
member.summary: If nonzero, indicates that the raising of the Changed event has been suspended. This value is incremented when SuspendChangedEvent is called and decremented when ResumeAndRaiseChangedEvent is called.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.HasChanged
member.summary: If true, the serializable state of this object has changed since the last time it was serialized.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: Should be set to true when called from your public Dispose() method, thus disposing of all managed and unmanaged resources. It should be set to false when called from your Finalizer, thus disposing of only unmanaged resources.
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this class instance. Only derived classes that implement Dispose should call this method; Other clients who wish to explicitly release resources should call IDisposable.Dispose. Do not attempt to access an object after it has been disposed.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Clone
member.summary: Returns a deep copy of this class instance. Derived classes that implement Clone should override this method; other clients who wish to clone this instance should call ICloneable.Clone. See also CogSerializer.DeepCopyObject

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.SuspendChangedEvent
member.summary: Temporarily suspends the raising of the Changed event. May be called more than once, and a corresponding call to ResumeAndRaiseChangedEvent must be made for each call to SuspendChangedEvent.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.ResumeAndRaiseChangedEvent
member.summary: Re-enables raising of the Changed event after SuspendChangedEvent has been called. Also raises the Changed event if the ChangedEventSuspended count is reduced to zero and any changes were made while events were suspended. Must be called once for each call to SuspendChangedEvent.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)
member.param: The array into which to copy.
The index from which to start copying.
member.summary: Copies the contents of this collection to an array.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Open(System.String,Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileModeConstants)

param.name: fileName
param.PARA: The name of the image file to open.

param.name: mode
param.PARA: A value that indicates that mode in which to open the image file.

remarks.PARA: Opens an image file using the image file provider that corresponds to the file's extension. If more than one image file provider supports the extension, the one selected is undefined.
If you do not specify an file open mode, defaults to Read .

member.summary: Open an image file.

exception.para: An error occurred while opening the specified file.
A supplied image file extension was not recognized.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Append an image to a file Dim ImageFile1 As New CogImageFile ImageFile1.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read)

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Close
member.summary: Close an open image file.

remarks.PARA: Closes the open image file and sets the property to "". If an image file is not currently open, calling has no effect.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Append an image to a file Dim ImageFile1 As New CogImageFile Dim Image As CogImage8Grey ImageFile1.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Image = ImageFile1(0)

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Append(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage)

param.name: newImage
param.PARA: The to append to file.

event.para: The new image count is provided in .
The following state flag may be affected:

remarks.PARA: Appends an image to the end of an image file.

member.summary: Append image to end of file.

exception.para: The image file is not opened in a mode that permits writing.
The image provider does not support multiple images.

example.code:
Imports Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile
' Append an image to a file Dim ImageFile1 As New CogImageFile Dim Image As CogImage8Grey ImageFile1.Open("c:\image.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Read) Image = ImageFile1(0) ImageFile1.Close()
Dim ImageFile2 As New CogImageFile ImageFile2.Open("c:\image_copy.bmp", CogImageFileModeConstants.Write) ImageFile2.Append(Image) ImageFile2.Close()

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Delete(System.Int32[])

param.name: imageIndices
param.PARA: The image indices to delete.

member.summary: Delete the specified images from the current open file.

remarks.PARA: Delete the specified images from the current open file. You specify the images to delete by supplying a dynamic array containing the indices of the images to delete.
The disk space occupied by the deleted images is reclaimed.

event.para: The number of images in the file has changed.
The following state flag may be affected:

exception.para: The file is not open for writing.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.DeleteImage(System.Int32)

param.name: imageIndex
param.PARA: The index of the image to delete.

event.para: The number of images in the file has changed.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.summary: Delete the specified image from the current open file.

exception.para: The file is not open for writing.

remarks.PARA: Delete the specified image from the current open file. This function is equivalent to , except that you supply a single image index as an Integer.

member.name: E:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFile.Changed
member.summary: Occurs when one or more parts of the object's state may have changed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileBMP

remarks.PARA: Interface that supports access to bitmap (.bmp) image files.
24-bit color bitmap files are opened in color. Bitmap files of any other day are converted to grey-scale first.

member.summary: Object supporting access to .bmp files.

event.para: The property is changed.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.summary: The biYPelsPerMeter field of the bitmap header of the last image read or the next image to be written.

remarks.PARA: The biYPelsPerMeter field of the bitmap header of the last image read or the next image to be written. This property defaults to zero because many applications that write bitmaps set the biYPelsPerMeter field to zero.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileBMP.XPelsPerMeter

remarks.PARA: The biXPelsPerMeter field of the bitmap header of the last image read or the next image to be written. This property defaults to zero because many applications that write bitmaps set the biXPelsPerMeter field to zero.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileCDB
member.summary: Object supporting access to .cdb /.idb files.

remarks.PARA: Interface that supports access to Cognex image database (.cdb, .idb) files.
remarks.NOTE: When you save an image to a Cognex image file (.IDB) or Cognex image database (.CDB) using this tool, the tool saves the image, the selected space name of the image, and the coordinate space tree associated with the image. When you load an image from an .IDB or .CDB file, the selected space and the coordinate space tree are both restored as well.

member.summary: Re-enables raising of the Changed event after SuspendChangedEvent has been called. Also raises the Changed event if the ChangedEventSuspended count is reduced to zero and any changes were made while events were suspended. Must be called once for each call to SuspendChangedEvent.

param.name: imageIndex
param.PARA: The index for the image comment to retrieve.

remarks.PARA: Reads the comment at the given image collection index.

exception.para: The value supplied for is out of range

param.name: comment
param.PARA: A comment that describes the image.

event.para: The new image count is provided in .
The following state flag may be affected:

remarks.PARA: Appends an image and comment to the end of an image database file. This function also appends the selected space of the image and the coordinate space tree associated with the image.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTIFF

remarks.PARA: Interface that supports access to Tagged Image File Format (.tif) files.
24-bit color TIFF files are opened in color; each plane of the color image must be an 8-bit image.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTIFF.ReadTag(System.Int32,System.Int32)

param.name: imageIndex
param.PARA: The index position of the image.

param.name: tag
param.PARA: The image tag for which to retrieve data.

exception.para: The index specified for is out of range.

member.summary: Read the data associated with the specified tag.

remarks.PARA: Reads the data associated with the specified image tag. If the TIFF count field for this tag is greater than one and the tag does not contain ASCII information, returns an array containing the tag data. returns an empty variant if the tag does not exist.

returns.PARA: The data associated with the specified image tag, or an empty variant if the tag does not exist.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.InputImage
member.summary: Input image. This property may be set to enable recording.

remarks.PARA: Returns or sets the input image, which is used to enable image recording. In record mode, the input image is appended to the currently open image file.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.OutputImage

remarks.PARA: In read (playback) mode, when the tool is run the output image is set to the current image in the open image. Each invocation of updates .

member.summary: Output image. This is updated by each invocation of Run.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.ImageIndexIncrement

remarks.PARA: Number of images to increment after invocation of . Used when scrolling through an open image file.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.summary: Number of images to increment after invocation of Run.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.NextImageIndex
member.summary: Next image index.

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flag may be affected:

remarks.PARA: Next image index. When the Operator opens a new image file, the property is set to zero if the file is opened for reading or writing; or set to NumImages if the file is opened for update. is reset to the default any time the operator is changed.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.CurrentImageIndex

remarks.PARA: Current image index within the currently open image file. If a new file is opened for reading (playback mode) or writing (record mode), is set to -1. If the file is opened for update, is set to NumImages - 1.

member.summary: Current image index.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.Operator

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.summary: Operator of the tool.

remarks.PARA: Returns or sets the operator for this tool.
If a new operator has an open mode of read or close, sets to -1 and to 0. If the new operator has an open mode of write or update, sets to NumImages - 1 and to NumImages.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.CurrentRecordEnable

event.para: Fires when the value of this property changes.

remarks.PARA: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CurrentRecordConstants.

member.summary: Gets general information about the last call to Run.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the tool.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.Clone
member.summary: Returns a deep copy of this class instance. Derived classes that implement Clone should override this method; other clients who wish to clone this instance should call ICloneable.Clone. See also CogSerializer.DeepCopyObject.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.Run

event.para: Fires before the tool runs.

Fires when the tool runs. If the run was successful, results are generated; if the run was not successful, no results are generated and the previous results are cleared. Use after returns or in a event handler to determine whether a run was successful or unsuccessful.
The following state flags may be affected:
Fires after the tool runs.

member.summary: Runs the tool using the current parameter settings.

remarks.PARA: Performs the tool's primary function. In read (playback) mode, the tool sets the to the current image in the open image file. In write (record) mode, the tool appends the to the current open image file.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileTool.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: n/a
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this class instance. Only derived classes that implement Dispose should call this method; Other clients who wish to explicitly release resources should call IDisposable.Dispose. Do not attempt to access an object after it has been disposed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider

remarks.PARA: Implements methods and properties used by objects that support access to specific image file formats.

member.summary: Interface implemented by all objects that support a specific image file format.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider.Description

remarks.PARA: Text string with a description of this file type. Can be used in a control.

member.summary: Description of this file type to be used in a Common File Dialog.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider.FileTypes

remarks.PARA: A string that contains a semicolon separated list of file types that this image file provider can read or write. The following example string specifies file types for a Cognex Image Database provider: "idb;cdb".

member.summary: Semicolon separated list of file types that this provider can read or write.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider.OpenMode

member.summary: Mode in which the file was opened (or cogImageFile_Closed if no file open).

remarks.PARA: Name of the last opened file.

member.summary: Name of last opened file.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider.Open(System.String,Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.CogImageFileModeConstants)

param.name: fileName
param.PARA: The name of the file to open.

param.name: mode
param.PARA: A value indicating the mode in which to open the image file.

exception.para: An error occurred while opening the specified file.

remarks.PARA: Opens an image file using the image file provider that corresponds to the file's extension. If more than one image file provider supports the extension, the one selected is undefined.

member.summary: Open an image file using the given mode.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider.Close
member.summary: Close an open image file.

remarks.PARA: Closes the open image file and sets the property to "". If an image file is not currently open, calling has no effect.

event.para: The new image count is provided in .
The following state flag may be affected:

exception.para: The image file is not opened in a mode that permits writing.

remarks.PARA: Appends an image to the end of an image file.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.ImageFile.ICogImageFileProvider.Delete(System.Int32[])

param.name: imageIndices
param.PARA: The image indices to delete.

remarks.PARA: Delete the specified images from the current open file. You specify the images to delete by supplying a dynamic array containing the indices of the images to delete.
The storage space occupied by the deleted images is reclaimed.

exception.para: The file is not open for writing.

event.para: The number of images in the file has changed.
The following state flag may be affected:

member.summary: Delete the specified images from the current open file.
